clinical_substitutes.name: Shoulder MRI Arthrogram Alternatives
clinical_substitutes.description: A regular shoulder MRI can be substituted for an arthrogram in certain clinical scenarios

clinical_substitutes.name: Knee MRI Arthrogram Alternatives
clinical_substitutes.description: A regular knee MRI can be substituted for an arthrogram in certain clinical scenarios

clinical_substitutes.name: CT for MRI Alternatives
clinical_substitutes.description: CT may be substituted for MRI when MRI is contraindicated (pacemaker, implants, etc.)

clinical_substitutes.name: Open vs. Closed MRI
clinical_substitutes.description: Open MRI may be substituted for standard MRI for claustrophobic patients

clinical_substitutes.name: MRI with vs without Contrast
clinical_substitutes.description: MRI without contrast may be substituted when contrast is contraindicated

clinical_substitutes.name: CT with vs without Contrast
clinical_substitutes.description: CT without contrast may be substituted when contrast is contraindicated

clinical_substitutes.name: Limited vs Complete Joint Injection
clinical_substitutes.description: Medium joint injection may be substituted for large joint injection in certain cases
